directions: Mix blueberry jam, Greek yogurt, almond milk, stevia sweetener, lemon juice, vanilla extract, salt, and cinnamon together in a bowl.
Pour mixture into an ice cream maker; churn to the consistency of frozen yogurt according to manufacturer's instructions, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons stevia sweetener (such as Truvia®), or more to taste
title: Blueberry Frozen Yogurt
